title: Kristufek's Hawthorne selections for Friday's races
text:
Here is today's link to Daily Herald handicapper Joe Kristufek's selections for Hawthorne's races on Friday, Oct. 2.
Click on the attached PDF listed below to download and then print Joe's selections.
